alert.note: Alert for Atlantic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 5:48PM EDT until June 06 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Atlantic County in southern New Jersey... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 548 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elwood-Magnolia, or 16 miles east of Vineland, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Atlantic City, Pleasantville, Ventnor City, Brigantine, Northfield, Absecon, Margate City, Egg Harbor City, Weymouth, Port Republic, Longport, Pomona, Mays Landing, Elwood-Magnolia and Linwood. This includes the following highways... Garden State Parkway between mile markers 33 and 48. Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 0 and 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
